definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="String" id="payment_request">payment_request</variable><variable type="String" id="r_hash">r_hash</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">try {&#10;java.net.http.HttpClient client = java.net.http.HttpClient.newHttpClient();&#10;&#10;java.net.http.HttpRequest request = java.net.http.HttpRequest&#10;.newBuilder()&#10;.uri(java.net.URI.create("http://localhost:8080/v1/invoices"))&#10;.POST(java.net.http.HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.ofString("{\"value\": 1000, \"expiry\": 60}"))&#10;.build();&#10;&#10;java.net.http.HttpResponse<String> response = client.send(request, java.net.http.HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString());&#10;&#10;EmeralndMod.LOGGER.info("Got response: " + response.body());&#10;&#10;com.google.gson.JsonElement invoiceEl = com.google.gson.JsonParser.parseString(response.body());&#10;&#10;com.google.gson.JsonObject invoiceObj = invoiceEl.getAsJsonObject();&#10;&#10;payment_request = invoiceObj.get("payment_request").getAsString();&#10;&#10;r_hash = String.format("%064x", new java.math.BigInteger(1, java.util.Base64.getDecoder().decode(invoiceObj.get("r_hash").getAsString())));&#10;&#10;EmeralndMod.LOGGER.info("Got r_hash: " + r_hash);&#10;&#10;} catch (Exception e) {&#10;java.io.StringWriter sw = new java.io.StringWriter();&#10;java.io.PrintWriter pw = new java.io.PrintWriter(sw);&#10;e.printStackTrace(pw);&#10;EmeralndMod.LOGGER.error(sw.toString());&#10;return;&#10;}</field><next><block
